bug.short_desc: Combobox list collapses when clicking on slider parts

long_desc.thetext:
Since version 4.0 the combobox will collapse it's list when the user clicks on any item of the slider of the list.
This can simple be seen by going to:
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/4.0/widgetbrowser/index.html
1. Open the list of the combobox after the label 'ComboBox' 2. now click on the arrow down 3. See that the combo box closes it's list
When doing the same on version 3.5.1 this will not happen:
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/3.5.1/widgetbrowser/index.html
The combo will also close when clicking on the 'thumb' part of the slider and also when clicking on the part that's between the thumb and the up/down buttons. So basically any click on the slider will close the combo box.
Thanks for the report. Seems like none in the team uses the scrollbars anymore.
Fixed with f025242a702a5ccc98d00aaf50a3fdebee5f2f89 on master 12c4a6dbb4a041b88799eeb1aff7ba1a2bb01d55 on branch_4_1_x
